title: Full of mistakes 错误百出
introduction: Listen to the tape and answer these questions. He says thinks believes knows understands is afraid is sorry is sure that he is... feels.. has(got)... needs.. wants ... can... must. will...
听录音并回答问题。他说认为相信知道理解害怕抱歉确定他感到...有...需要...想要...能...必须将会...

notes.title: want
notes.describe: want + 宾语 + to-infinitive 结构表示“想要某人做某事”。例如：I want you to go.（我要你去。）

notes.title: Tell
notes.describe: tell + 宾语 + to-infinitive 结构用来发出指令或信息。例如：Tell him to come here.（告诉他来这里。）

notes.title: Give
notes.describe: give + 双宾语 + 名词，表示“给某人某物”。例如：Give me a book.（给我一本书。）

notes.title: Which one?
notes.describe: 用来询问特定范围内的单个选择。

notes.title: Which ones?
notes.describe: 用来询问特定范围内的多个选择。

notes.title: How many are there?
notes.describe: 用于询问可数事物数量的问句。

notes.title: How much is it?
notes.describe: 用于询问不可数事物的数量或价格。
